core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Swiss Precision' with 'Stock Market' urgency.
Emotion First: The Buyer feels 'Control', The Supplier feels 'Competition'.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Noise is the enemy.
Negative Space: Dense data needs breathing room. Use whitespace to group logic.
anti_patterns: No gradients on text (Keep it legible).

installation.instructions: Add the following import to your index.css or index.html

usage_rules.headings: Use 'font-heading' (Manrope) for all h1-h6. Weights: 600/700/800. Tracking: tight.
usage_rules.numbers: MANDATORY: Use 'font-mono' (JetBrains Mono) for ALL prices, timers, bids, and rank indicators. This is critical for the 'Trading Floor' aesthetic.

primary.description: Indigo 600 - A deeper, more confident blue than standard Tailwind blue.

secondary.description: Slate 100 - High contrast surface for components.

spacing.base_scale: Use 2x standard spacing. Minimum padding for cards: p-6 or p-8.

bento_grids.live_auction_mode: grid-cols-12 gap-4. Hero Metric (Time): col-span-12 md:col-span-4. Ranking Table: col-span-12 md:col-span-8 row-span-2.

buttons.primary: rounded-md bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-md transition-all active:scale-95 font-medium px-8 py-3
buttons.outline: rounded-md border-2 border-slate-200 bg-transparent hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 text-slate-700 font-medium

cards.style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-[0_4px_20px_-4px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)] hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_-4px_rgba(0,0,0,0.08)] transition-shadow duration-300

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-md border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 px-4 text-slate-900 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500/20 focus:bg-white transition-all
inputs.label_style: text-sm font-semibold text-slate-700 mb-2 block uppercase tracking-wide

status_badges.L1: inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 border border-emerald-200 font-mono
status_badges.L2: inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border border-amber-200 font-mono
status_badges.L3: inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold bg-rose-100 text-rose-700 border border-rose-200 font-mono

textures.noise: Use a subtle noise overlay on the sidebar or header to reduce digital flatness (opacity 0.02).

libraries.charts: recharts (via shadcn/ui charts). Minimalist line charts for bid history.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install fonts immediately. Update tailwind.config.js with the new font families and colors.
2. THEME: Default to Light Mode. It is cleaner for data tables. Use Dark Mode ONLY for the 'Live Auction' screen if desired, but keep it consistent.
3. DATA: Always align numbers to the RIGHT. Use JetBrains Mono for all pricing and timers.
4. FORMS: Break large forms (Create Auction) into steps. Do not show 50 inputs at once.
5. CONFIDENTIALITY UI: In Supplier View, explicitly label hidden fields (e.g., 'Competitor Bid: HIDDEN').
6. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: When a new bid comes in via WebSocket, flash the row background yellow/green for 500ms.
7. IMAGE USAGE: Only use images for empty states or login backgrounds. Do not clutter the dashboard with photos.
